rows.label: qst202102_0010
rows.name:
Amazing. So this is the
ancient stone tablet.

rows.label: qst202102_0020
rows.name:
This is[ML:Dash ] Something far surpassing
a stone tablet, isn't it[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202102_0030
rows.name:
It's technically a board, but
it's incredibly thin, you know[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202102_0040
rows.name: Is this floating?

rows.label: qst202102_0050
rows.name:
That weird little box
is also suspicious[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202102_0060
rows.name: Hmmm[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202102_0070
rows.name:
Seems like a mechanism where
pictures float in the air[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202102_0080
rows.name: Heh, that's a strange thing, ain't it[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202102_0090
rows.name: To create something like this[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202102_0100
rows.name:
Just as I thought, ancient technology
is far beyond our imagination.

rows.label: qst202102_0110
rows.name:
Shiki, more importantly, aren't
there characters appearing?

rows.label: qst202102_0120
rows.name: Eh? Ah[ML:Dash ] It's true.

rows.label: qst202102_0130
rows.name:
Wouldn't it be fine if I
just touched it randomly?

rows.label: qst202102_0140
rows.name: Wah wah wah! Zeke, no!

rows.label: qst202102_0150
rows.name: Why, Shiki?

rows.label: qst202102_0160
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Don't touch it without
permission. What do you
intend to do if it breaks?

rows.label: qst202102_0170
rows.name:
Just looking at it, the
structure seems fragile. We
have to treat it carefully[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202102_0180
rows.name: Well, sorry about that.

rows.label: qst202102_0190
rows.name:
So, was there anything written
about ancient knowledge?

rows.label: qst202102_0200
rows.name: No, doesn't look like it's written[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202102_0210
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]I wonder what this is? Is it telling
us to input numbers or letters?

rows.label: qst202102_0220
rows.name:
One, two, three[ML:Dash ] Looks like
there are twelve digits.

rows.label: qst202102_0230
rows.name: I see. So that's what it is.

rows.label: qst202102_0240
rows.name: Did you get a flash of insight?

rows.label: qst202102_0250
rows.name:
This is a challenge from
ancient times telling me
to solve this riddle.

rows.label: qst202102_0260
rows.name: Ooh, I'm getting fired up.

rows.label: qst202102_0270
rows.name:
Everyone, I am going back to
my room to analyze the mystery
of this stone tablet.

rows.label: qst202102_0280
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst202102_0290
rows.name: Well then.

rows.label: qst202102_0300
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]She just left, didn't she?

rows.label: qst202102_0310
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]She just left.
